name: hospital-api
description: Sistema de GestÃ£o Hospitalar com PostgreSQL

scripts.healthcheck: node -e "const http = require('http'); const options = { host: 'localhost', port: process.env.PORT || 3000, path: '/health', timeout: 2000 }; const request = http.request(options, (res) => { process.exit(res.statusCode === 200 ? 0 : 1); }); request.on('error', () => { process.exit(1); }); request.end();"
